      • layoutChildren

        protected void layoutChildren()
        Overrides:
        layoutChildren in class javafx.scene.Parent

      • scaleValueText

        protected void scaleValueText()

        The value should automatically fill the needle as much as possible. But it should not constantly switch font size, so it cannot be based on the current content of value’s Text node. So to determine how much the Text node must be scaled, the calculation is based on value’s extremes: min and max value. The smallest scale factor is the one to use (using the larger would make the other extreme go out of the circle).
